languages.text: {n}Энергетическое поле серьезно истощено атаками ксеносов, но еще держится. При вашем приближении оно будто бы чуть-чуть прогибается, чтобы быть подальше от вас. Солдаты Калькасара, укрывшиеся за ним, растеряли хладнокровие, но оружие бросать не спешат.{/n}

{n}The energy field has been largely depleted by the xenos attacks, but it is still holding on. When you approach it, it seems to bend slightly as if trying to get away. Calcazar's soldiers who are taking cover behind it have lost some of their composure, but they are in no hurry to drop their weapons.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Энергетическое поле серьезно истощено атаками ксеносов, но еще держится. При вашем приближении оно будто бы чуть-чуть прогибается, чтобы быть подальше от вас. Солдаты Калькасара, укрывшиеся за ним, растеряли хладнокровие, но оружие бросать не спешат.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The energy field is largely depleted by the xenos attacks, but it is still holding. When you approach it seems to bend slightly as if trying to get away. The Calcazar's soldiers cowering behind it lost some of their composure but are in no hurry to drop their weapons.{/n}

{n}The energy field is largely depleted by the xenos attacks, but it is still holding. When you approach it seems to bend slightly as if trying to get away. The Calcazar's soldiers cowering behind it lost some of their composure but are in no hurry to drop their weapons.{/n}

{n}The energy field is largely depleted by the xenos attacks, but it is still holding on. When you approach it, it seems to bend slightly as if trying to get away. Calcazar's soldiers ducking behind it have lost some of their composure but are in no hurry to drop their weapons.{/n}

{n}The energy field is largely depleted by the xenos attacks, but it is still holding on. When you approach it, it seems to bend slightly as if trying to get away. Calcazar's soldiers ducking behind it have lost some of their composure but are in no hurry to drop their weapons.{/n}

{n}The energy field has been largely depleted by the xenos attacks, but it is still holding on. When you approach it, it seems to bend slightly as if trying to get away. Calcazar's soldiers who are taking cover behind it have lost some of their composure, but they are in no hurry to drop their weapons.{/n}

{n}The energy field has been largely depleted by the xenos attacks, but it is still holding on. When you approach it, it seems to bend slightly as if trying to get away. Calcazar's soldiers who are taking cover behind it have lost some of their composure, but they are in no hurry to drop their weapons.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les attaques des xénos ont largement épuisé le champ d'énergie, mais il résiste toujours. Lorsque vous en approchez, il semble se courber légèrement comme pour s'échapper. Les soldats de Calcazar abrités derrière commencent à perdre leur sang-froid, mais ne semblent pas pressés de déposer les armes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The energy field has been largely depleted by the xenos attacks, but it is still holding on. When you approach it, it seems to bend slightly as if trying to get away. Calcazar's soldiers who are taking cover behind it have lost some of their composure, but they are in no hurry to drop their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les attaques des xénos ont largement épuisé le champ d'énergie, mais il résiste toujours. Lorsque vous en approchez, il semble se courber légèrement comme pour s'échapper. Les soldats de Calcazar abrités derrière commencent à perdre leur sang-froid, mais ils ne semblent pas pressés de déposer les armes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El campo de energía está prácticamente agotado tras el asalto de los xenos, pero se mantiene firme. Cuando te aproximas a él, parece curvarse ligeramente, como si tratara de alejarse. Los soldados de Calcazar, apostados tras él, han perdido parte de su compostura, pero no parecen tener prisa por abandonar las armas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The energy field has been largely depleted by the xenos attacks, but it is still holding on. When you approach it, it seems to bend slightly as if trying to get away. Calcazar's soldiers who are taking cover behind it have lost some of their composure, but they are in no hurry to drop their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El campo de energía está casi agotado tras el asalto de los xenos, pero se mantiene firme. Cuando te aproximas a él, parece curvarse ligeramente, como si tratara de alejarse. Los soldados de Calcazar cubiertos tras él han perdido parte de su compostura, pero no parecen tener prisa por abandonar las armas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}由于异形的攻击，能量场几乎已经耗尽了能量，但它依然在努力坚持着。当你靠近它时，它似乎在微微弯曲，仿佛想要从你面前逃开。卡尔卡扎的士兵躲在能量场后面，不再像之前那么镇定，但他们似乎并不急于放下武器。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The energy field has been largely depleted by the xenos attacks, but it is still holding on. When you approach it, it seems to bend slightly as if trying to get away. Calcazar's soldiers who are taking cover behind it have lost some of their composure, but they are in no hurry to drop their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}由于异形的攻击，能量场几乎已经耗尽了能量，但它依然在努力坚持着。当你靠近它时，它似乎在微微弯曲，仿佛想要从你面前逃开。卡尔卡扎的士兵躲在能量场后面，不再像之前那么镇定，但他们似乎并不急于放下武器。{/n}

languages.text: {n}エネルギー・フィールドは異種族の攻撃で大きく消耗しているが、まだ持ちこたえている。そこに近づくと、逃げようとするかのようにわずかに湾曲する。その後ろに隠れているカルカサルの兵士たちは、いくらか冷静さを失っているが、慌てて武器を捨てるようなことはしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The energy field has been largely depleted by the xenos attacks, but it is still holding on. When you approach it, it seems to bend slightly as if trying to get away. Calcazar's soldiers who are taking cover behind it have lost some of their composure, but they are in no hurry to drop their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}エネルギー・フィールドは異種族の攻撃で大きく消耗しているが、まだ持ちこたえている。そこに近づくと、逃げようとするかのようにわずかに湾曲する。その後ろに隠れているカルカサルの兵士たちは冷静さを失っているが、慌てて武器を捨てるようなことはしない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Energiefeld ist durch die Angriffe des Xenos schon fast erschöpft, aber noch hält es. Als du dich näherst, scheint es sich leicht zu biegen, als würde es versuchen, dir auszuweichen. Calcazars Soldaten, die dahinter in Deckung gegangen sind, haben ein wenig ihrer Gelassenheit eingebüßt. Sie machen aber keine Anstalten, ihre Waffen fallenzulassen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The energy field has been largely depleted by the xenos attacks, but it is still holding on. When you approach it, it seems to bend slightly as if trying to get away. Calcazar's soldiers who are taking cover behind it have lost some of their composure, but they are in no hurry to drop their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Energiefeld ist durch die Angriffe des Xenos schon fast erschöpft, aber noch hält es. Als du dich näherst, scheint es sich leicht zu biegen, als würde es versuchen, dir auszuweichen. Calcazars Soldaten, die dahinter kauern, haben ein wenig ihrer Gelassenheit eingebüßt, machen aber keine Anstalten, ihre Waffen fallenzulassen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Enerji alanı, zeno saldırılarından büyük hasar alsa da hâlâ dayanıyor. Alana yaklaştığında sanki kaçmaya çalışırmış gibi biraz esnediğini fark ediyorsun. Arkasında siper alan Calcazar'ın askerleri, soğukkanlılıklarını kısmen kaybetmiş olsa da silah bırakmaya niyetli değil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The energy field has been largely depleted by the xenos attacks, but it is still holding on. When you approach it, it seems to bend slightly as if trying to get away. Calcazar's soldiers who are taking cover behind it have lost some of their composure, but they are in no hurry to drop their weapons.{/n}
